item.title: E-CTF - Osint - Vacation
item.description: Osint - Vacation - Writeup Description People even try to turn their pets into celebrities, it gets annoying quite fast. That reminds me, have you come across @tig3r_and_b3ar ? Apparently their owner is a photographer, I havenâ€™t contacted her though. Writeup Since the owner is a photographer we should look at instagram. By using an instagram viewer we can look at her profile without actually logging in. The one thing that sticks out here is that this account is following exactly one other account.
